DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Discarding or playing this card reduces the hatch number, when discarded or played at 1, it transforms into a different card.
If you aren't Satiated, draw X cards and gain Satiated.
You do not draw cards from Foraging while Satiated.
When played, discard the top card of your deck and place this card on top of your deck.
Deal 5 extra damage and gain 5 extra block when you are Stout. Reduced by 1 each turn.
Shuffle a Bottle into your deck when played.
Causes damage at the end of turn. Can be blocked. Decays by half each turn rounded down.
Gored Creatures take damage when you play a card.
Constricted enemies take damage at the end of their turn.
